item.title: Truning into a npc
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

rob014:

Ok I got this to make you trun into a npc but how do i make it work the same as objects and items any help please

“But how do I make it work the same as objects and items”
What the heck are you talking about. Please get a mental health check and come back. Or get put into a coma, thats always fun!
Next time actually post what you want other people to do for you, if your too lazy to do it yourself. But you didn’t even post what you want, I think thats a whole new record of laziness!

Do you think were mind readers or something?

item.title: Truning into a npc
item.dc:creator: @rob014 rob014
item.description:
@rob014 wrote:

Ok I got this to make you trun into a npc but how do i make it work the same as objects and items any help please

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6465) { npcId = 1321; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

thats my code for truning you into a bunny hehe

thanks for your time and help=)

-Rob

Read full topic
